content: Our Newly Appointed DOJ needs to actively go after the Politicians, Lawyers, People, Employers,Groups, and Organizations aiding illegals……………….Federal Immigration and Nationality Act Section 8 USC 1324(a)(1)(A)(iv)(b)(iii) — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — — And we wouldn’t even need a wall if 3 laws where enacted and all our other laws enforced…………..1) E-verify and fine and jail those that employ Illegals. 2) Birthright Citizenship should only go to children born to 1 American parent. 3) Stop all Social Services and Government Programs that enable Illegals to stay………………And yes those coming into this nation need to be vetted..We have no idea what is in their hearts, minds, or bodies when they sneak across our borders.
